attributes.name: Glycolic Acid 7% Toning Solution
attributes.how-to-text:
* Use ideally in the evening, no more frequently than once per day.
* After cleaning, saturate a cotton pad with the formula and sweep across the face and neck.
* Do not use on sensitive, peeling or compromised skin.
* Avoid the eye contour and contact with the eyes.
* Do not rinse off.
* Continue with additional skin treatments as needed.
* Contact of the product with the skin must be of limited frequency or duration. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised.
* Keep out of reach of children.
* Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.
attributes.description: A toning solution with 7% glycolic acid to exfoliate the skin and amino acids, aloe vera, ginseng and tasmanian pepperberry.
attributes.benefits: This 7% toning solution offers mild exfoliation for improved skin radiance and visible clarity. The formula also improves the appearance of skin texture with continued use.  This formula contains a studied Tasmanian Pepperberry derivative, which is of plant origin and varies in colour seasonally. This colour variation may be apparent in the formula from time to time. The formula is further supported with inclusion of ginseng root and aloe vera for both visible radiance and skin soothing benefits.
attributes.ingredients: Aqua (Water), Glycolic Acid, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Centaurea Cyanus Flower Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Water, Propanediol, Glycerin, Triethanolamine, Aminomethyl Propanol, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Tasmannia Lanceolata Fruit/Leaf Extract, Aspartic Acid, Alanine, Glycine, Serine, Valine, Isoleucine, Proline, Threonine, Histidine, Phenylalanine, Glutamic Acid, Arginine, Pca, Sodium Pca, Sodium Lactate, Fructose, Glucose, Sucrose, Urea, Hexyl Nicotinate, Dextrin, Citric Acid, Polysorbate 20, Gellan Gum, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Sodium Chloride, Hexylene Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol.

attributes.name: Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1%
attributes.how-to-text:
* Apply to entire face morning and evening before heavier creams.
* We do not recommend combining this product in the same regimen with Direct or Ethylated Vitamin C (LAA/ELAA) and Vitamin C Derivatives.
attributes.description: A high-strength vitamin and mineral blemish formula that reduces the appearance of skin blemishes and congestion.
attributes.benefits: This formula incorporates a high 10% concentration of Niacinamide, as well as a 1% concentration of Zinc to balance visible aspects of sebum activity, thereby reducing the appearance of textural irregularities, enlarged pores and visible shine. Niacinamide, also known as Vitamin B3, is a well-studied active ingredient that is renowned for its multiple benefits on the skin. It contributes to supporting the production of components that play a central role in the structural and functional integrity of the skin.
attributes.ingredients: Aqua (Water), Niacinamide, Pentylene Glycol, Zinc PCA, Tamarindus Indica Seed Gum, Xanthan Gum, Isoceteth-20, Ethoxydiglycol, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin.

attributes.how-to-text: Wet skin, and massage over face and eyes, then rinse.
attributes.description: A best-selling universal face wash that’s proven to maintain skin’s pH while also cleansing, softening, and hydrating all skin types and tones.
attributes.benefits: This hydrating face wash is proven effective on nearly 200 adults of all ages, genders, skin types, and tones. Featuring upcycled soy proteins, the makeup-removing, non-stripping formula deeply cleanses pores while maintaining the skin's pH and increasing hydration—even after you rinse.

attributes.name: Airbrush Flawless Setting Spray
attributes.how-to-text:
* Hold airbrush flawless setting spray 6-8 inches away and mist over your entire face before and after applying makeup.
* Avoid eye areas.
attributes.description: A setting spray that weightlessly primes and sets for up to 16 hours for the perfect looking makeup day, every day.
attributes.benefits: This hydrating setting spray instantly locks in your look for makeup magic that looks ‘just applied’. Flawless film formers act as an invisible shield to help flawlessly set makeup all day without melting, fading or settling into lines. It also features aloe vera which contains vitamins and minerals. Skin is left feeling smooth and supple. Japanese green tea helps to create softer, hydrated feeling skin. Aromatic resin from the bark of a tree grown on the Greek island of Chios helps to keep pores clear.

attributes.name: Eye Masks
attributes.how-to-text:
The morning after a sleepless night, or in the evening after a long day spent staring at a screen, use Sephora Collection’s eye patches to quickly and effectively rescue your eyes. Five minutes is all it takes, thanks to their bio-cellulose composition and super-ingredients. If any product remains on the skin around the eyes after the eye patches are removed, tap delicately until it is absorbed. No need to rinse.

The beautiful skin combo: Why not pamper your skin at home? To complement the effect of Sephora Collection’s eye patches, we also offer an entire range of targeted-action masks to pamper your face. Choose your favorite super-ingredients amongst our eucalyptus fiber face masks or our vitamin-rich face masks.
attributes.description: The skin in the eye contour area is so thin and delicate that it needs extra special care to stay beautiful. There's always a solution to every problem with Sephora Collection’s eye masks. They help relieve puffiness and under eye dark circles, as well as moisturize and smooth the skin. The bio-cellulose eye patches are formulated with 91% naturally derived ingredients and enriched with plant extracts to make your eyes even more beautiful.
attributes.benefits:
Sephora Collection’s eye masks are made of bio-cellulose extracted from fermented coconut water. This ultra-thin, super-absorbent material absorbs three times more serum than a nonwoven fabric, and absorbs the active ingredients more effectively to produce results in just five minutes! In line with our exacting standards, Sephora Collection has selected four super-ingredients known for their ability to reduce puffiness and under eye dark circles, brighten, hydrate, and smooth skin to suit your own personal needs.

Each eye patch delivers its own specific treatment:
- Cucumber: With its high vitamin and mineral content, cucumber is ideal for soothing delicate skin.
- Pomegranate: The vitamins contained in pomegranate tone the skin to awaken your eyes in just a blink!
- Caffeine: Our caffeine is extracted from green coffee beans. Known for its energy-boosting properties, it is perfect for awakening tired and dull eyes!
- Watermelon: Watermelon’s draws its ability to hydrate and soften skin from its high water, vitamin, and mineral content.

attributes.how-to-text:
Which Moisturizing Face Mask should you choose to target your current beauty goals? 

Looking to nourish and soothe? Try the Moisturizing Face Mask with coconut extract. 
Looking to mattify and reduce the appearance of dilated pores? Try the Moisturizing Face Mask with matcha tea extract. 
Looking to moisturize and boost skin radiance? Try the Moisturizing Face Mask with lychee extract. 
Looking to quench skin and plump it up? Try the Moisturizing Face Mask with watermelon extract. 
Looking to fight the visible effects of pollution and boost radiance? Try the Moisturizing Face Mask with blueberry extract. 
Looking to improve skin texture and even out the complexion? Try the Moisturizing Face Mask with lemon extract. 

What’s the best way to use a sheet mask infused with hyaluronic acid? 
1. Unfold the sheet mask. 
2. Apply mask to clean, dry skin. 
3. Leave the sheet mask on the face for 10 minutes before removing. 
4. Tip: massage in any remaining serum using the Sephora Collection Rose Quartz Facial Roller. 
No need to rinse. Avoid contact with eyes. Use twice weekly.
attributes.description: A sheet mask with hyaluronic acid and plant extracts for lasting hydration and targeted benefits in 10 minutes.
attributes.benefits:
Texture: Masks 
Skin type: Dry, Normal, Oily, Combination 

Active ingredients: 
Coconut - Nourishing & soothing 
Matcha - Mattifying & pore targetting 
Lychee - Moisturizing & glowing 
Watermelon - Quenching & plumping 
Blueberry - Skin perfecting & radiance 
Lemon - Purifying & clarifying 

1 Moisturizing Face Mask sold worldwide every 5 seconds*. The no. 1* Sephora Collection Moisturizing Face Mask is back and better than before with these sheet masks made using a fine fiber derived from acacia, resulting in a second skin effect mask for optimum skin absorption.
It only takes 10 minutes for this face mask to boost skin hydration! 

Each sheet mask is formulated with hyaluronic acid and a cocktail of fruits and plants for instant and lasting hydration and targeted benefits. Whether it is to mattify skin, boost radiance or soothe complexion, everything is possible with these face care masks. 

* Global Sephora Retail sales 2022

attributes.name: The Skin Support Set
attributes.how-to-text: * Apply a few drops to the face morning and evening before creams.
attributes.description: A perfect duo to give skin a boost for smoother, brighter, plumper results with every use.
attributes.benefits: Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5 is a water-based formula that draws hydration to multiple layers of your skin, with next-generation HA and pro-vitamin B5 for smoother, plumper skin. Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% visibly improves skin smoothness, brightness and integrity with every application. This dynamic duo is suited for anyone looking to add a boost of active ingredients to their regimen.

attributes.name: Radiant Creamy Concealer
attributes.how-to-text: Using the applicator tip, dab the concealer directly onto imperfections or your under-eye area, then blend with your fingertips.
attributes.description: An award-winning radiant creamy concealer featuring an exclusive gold-and-red heart top.
attributes.benefits: This concealer delivers long-lasting, 16-hour wear. It corrects imperfections. Mineral tone balancing powder works to optically correct, not mask, imperfections. Unique powders even skin tone and provide invisible skin correction so skin looks radiant, fresh, and natural. It blurs the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Light diffusing mineral powder reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and helps even out skin tone. It hides imperfections all day long and improves the look of skin the multi-active botanical blend, including magnolia bark extract, grape seed extract, and vitamin E, hydrates, firms, reduces redness, and strengthens the skin by helping its barrier retain vital moisture. Delivers essential antioxidant protection to help protect skin against damaging free radicals.

attributes.name: Organic Cotton Pads
attributes.how-to-text: Use daily on your face, neck and eyes using your usual make-up remover or cleanser.
attributes.description: Organic cotton pads for face, eyes and neck.
attributes.benefits: Made with 100% organic cotton fibers, these Sephora Collection make-up remover pads help remove make-up without irritating the skin. They are GOTS certified by Ecocert. They are extra-soft and lint free. Thanks to their dense texture and square shape, your skin will be clean in one swipe. The embossed side helps remove make-up and the smooth side eliminates any residues.

attributes.name: Unseen Sunscreen Broad Spectrum Sunscreen SPF 40 PA+++
attributes.how-to-text:
* Apply generously and evenly as the last step in your skincare routine, before makeup and 15 minutes before sun exposure.
* Reapply at least every 2 hours or after 40 minutes of swimming or sweating.
attributes.description: A totally invisible, weightless, scentless, makeup-gripping, daily primer with SPF 40.
attributes.benefits: This innovative, antioxidant-rich SPF primer preps skin for makeup while providing broad spectrum SPF 40 and protection from blue light, the light emitted from our phones and computers. The unique oil-free formula glides onto skin providing shine control and leaving a velvety, makeup-gripping finish.

attributes.name: Shape Tape Contour Concealer
attributes.how-to-text:
* Apply concealer directly onto imperfections and blend using the larger, domed end of the sponge.
* To best conceal dark circles, trace the concealer onto the undereye area in a triangle of light formation and blend.
* For best results, blend out with the quickie blending sponge (sold separately).
attributes.description: A vegan, super-blendable concealer that instantly helps brighten, smoothen and give the skin a firmer, more lifted look.
attributes.benefits: Get full coverage with a flawless matte finish with this concealer that covers all imperfections and doubles as a contour/highlighter.  Its creamy, easy-to-blend formula won't flake or crease. Mango seed and shea butters nourish and help illuminate your skin for a lifted effect.

attributes.name: No-Rinse Brush Cleaner Spray
attributes.how-to-text:
How do you use it?
1. Spray the product 2 or 3 times onto a tissue or cotton pad.
2. Run the brush over the tissue to remove makeup. No need to rinse - The brush is clean and can be reused immediately!
attributes.description: A Sephora Collection No-Rinse Brush Cleaner to be used on a regular basis.
attributes.benefits:
Our No-Rinse Brush Cleaner helps to take care of your brushes for better hygiene.
This cleaner can even be used on your most delicate makeup brushes for a thorough cleaning without damaging them.
It’s perfect for cleaning all types of Sephora Collection brushes.

Benefits
* A formula that easily and quickly removes makeup.
* No need to rinse.
* A quick-drying formula so your brushes can be reused immediately.

attributes.name: Studio Fix Powder Plus Foundation
attributes.heading: 15g
attributes.how-to-text:
* Apply to a well moisturised and prepped skin with a fluffy brush like the 129SH or 109 for lighter coverage.
* Apply with the sponge applicator for more coverage.
* If you use the sponge, make sure to replace it every few weeks and store it in the compartment underneath the powder and not in the top compartment with the powder.
* Try finishing your Studio Fix application with a light veil of Prep + Prime Fix+ to give your skin a fresh appearance!
attributes.description: A one-step powder and foundation that gives skin a smooth, flawless, all-matte finish with medium-to-full coverage and a velvety texture that allows skin to breathe.
attributes.benefits: This foundation is long-wearing, colour-true, non-caking, non-streaking, non-settling, non-creasing and non-fading, all for 12 hours.
attributes.ingredients:

attributes.name: 12H Retractable Waterproof Eyeliner
attributes.heading: 0.30g
attributes.how-to-text:
How should this waterproof eyeliner pencil be applied?
1. Twist the retractable eye pencil’s tube to release the lead. Use the built-in pencil sharpener for even more precise application.
2. Drag the long-wear waterproof eyeliner pencil along the inside and outside rims of your eye. For a more intense look, apply multiple layers.
3. If needed, use the foam tip to blend the product. Perform small gentle motions in the desired direction. The more you extend the product, the longer lines you will draw.
4. Admire, touch up, perfect, photograph, share.

How should this waterproof eyeliner pencil be removed?
Removing the retractable eyeliner pencil is easier than ever with Sephora Collection. The waterproof eye makeup remover is capable of removing long-wear eyeliner in a few easy steps. Its bi phase formula is even suitable for sensitive eyes.
Moreover, it contains cornflower floral water, known for its soothing properties. All this guarantees that your smoky eye makeup will resist (almost) everything. Go all out with a 100% black and 100% waterproof eyeliner.

The perfect product for a black waterproof eyeliner pencil?
A black waterproof mascara, of course. Waterproof size up is the perfect option to deliver immediate supersized volume to your lashes. The added bonus? size up comes in a large 14ml format.
attributes.description: A 3-in-1 retractable eyeliner whose super-creamy waterproof formula combines intensity and convenience.
attributes.benefits:
Finish: Matte, Shimmer or Glitter
Texture: Creamy pencil

This long-wear 3-in-1 retractable eyeliner pencil has a rich texture that blends easily onto your eyelids and enhances your eyes.
Convenient to apply, it smoothly glides along the eye waterline.

A pencil offering a wide range of possibilities
From a clean and uniform line to a smoky finish, it can be used as eyeliner or even as eyeshadow. This waterproof eyeliner pencil contains a pencil sharpener, letting you draw ultra-precise lines. Go one step further and try the eyeliner pencil's smudge tip, designed to help blend the formula.

A wide range of shades
This retractable eyeliner pencil comes in a wide range of highly pigmented shades. Black, brown, green, blue, purple, gray – find your essential everyday colors with irresistible matte, shimmer and glitter finishes.

What’s more, this very long-wear eyeliner features a waterproof formula, so the color stays in place all day long without ever losing its brightness. Enjoy 12 hours of non-stop intensity.

attributes.name: Addict Lip Glow Lip Balm
attributes.how-to-text:
* Wear on its own for a subtle custom color-awakening effect and 24-hour hydration or as a primer by removing excess product before applying lipstick, for smoothed and hydrated lips.
* It can be worn under the corresponding shade of Dior Addict Lip Maximizer or Dior Addict Lip Glow Oil to play with the color.
attributes.description: A lip balm formulated with 97% natural-origin ingredients that subtly revives the natural color of lips with a custom glow for 6 hours and hydrates the lips for 24 hours.
attributes.benefits: Even richer, this new range of shades is designed to meet the needs of women and men based on their desires and skin tone. The Dior Addict Lip Glow lip balm is still infused at its core with color reviver technology that adapts to the pH of each person's lips, revealing a custom color that delivers just the right dose of color, with a subtle shine. The entire complexion is instantly enhanced with beautified glowy lips. The new formula is infused with cherry oil, and shades to suit all skin tones: the essential Dior Addict Lip Glow lip balm has been reinvented with an as always sensorial texture for lips that are both beautified and protected from dryness. Multi-use, Dior Addict Lip Glow can be worn on its own as a lip balm or as a primer under lipstick.

attributes.name: Tattoo Liner Liquid Eyeliner
attributes.heading: 0.55ml
attributes.how-to-text:
* Storage Tip: Always store Tattoo Liner tip-down so the brush stays saturated.
* Shake before use to keep the formula flowing.
* Still feeling dry? Wipe tip with a damp tissue to remove eyeshadow build-up.
* When applying, use very light pressure for fine, exact lines (perfect for creating sharp cat eyeliner wings). Add more pressure to create a thicker, bold eyeliner look. The formula is also great for layering, so you can keep drawing over your lines until you achieve liner perfection.
* How to Fake Freckles: Using shade Mad Max Brown, make small dots wherever you want your faux freckles. Then use your fingers to tap the product into skin and make freckles appear more natural. For deeper skin tones, let the dots sit on skin for a few seconds before tapping.
attributes.description: An award-winning, waterproof liquid eyeliner with all-day wear and opaque pigment for creating ultra-precise lines inspired by tattoo artistry.
attributes.benefits: This high-pigment vegan formula is smudge-resistant and lasts all day. Shake before use to keep the ink flowing. Always store tip-down so the brush stays saturated. Create any look imaginable: The key is the fine-point brush tip for easy application, making Tattoo Liner the must-have eyeliner for everyone.

attributes.name: Glow Recipe X Barbie Skincare Kit
attributes.how-to-text:
* Mini Watermelon Glow Niacinamide Dew Drops: For a natural glow and brightening serum, apply 1 pump before moisturiser for long-lasting, glowing skin results. As a priming step, apply 1-2 pumps as the last step in your skincare routine before make-up. For a maximum glow, on a no-make-up day, apply 1-2 pumps as the last step of your entire routine. Hacks: Over make-up, pick up the formula using the ring finger and dab off the excess on the back of your hand. Then gently pat on the high points of the face in a tapping motion. As a primer, apply 1-2 pumps as the last step in your skincare routine before make-up for a smooth finish and glow. Mix with foundation for a boost of hydration and glow. For your eyes, dab a pea-size amount to the centre of the eyelid and blend out. For a double highlight, pat a drop below your foundation and layer with a powder highlighter on top.
* Mini Watermelon Glow Pink Juice Moisturizer: Use daily, morning and night. For oily/combo skin, use as a moisturiser after treatment products. Dispense 1 pump onto your fingertips and pat onto the skin until absorbed. For dry skin, use as a serum after toning. Dispense 1 pump onto the fingertips and pat into your skin until absorbed.
attributes.description: A collectible kit featuring clinically effective bestsellers Watermelon Niacinamide Dew Drops & Watermelon Pink Juice Oil-Free Moisturizer  for glowy, hydrated skin.
attributes.benefits: Glow Recipe has partnered with Barbie™ to break boundaries and celebrate real skin acceptance. Bestselling Watermelon Niacinamide Dew Drops can be worn alone or mixed with make-up to deliver an instant glow and boost hydration, while Watermelon Pink Juice Moisturizer soothes, brightens and provides lightweight, oil-free hydration.

attributes.how-to-text: Apply a few drops to face AM and PM before creams.
attributes.description: A hydration support formula with ultra-pure, vegan hyaluronic acid and Vitamin B5 which enhances surface hydration.

This formulation combines low-, medium- and high-molecular weight HA, as well as a next-generation HA crosspolymer at a combined concentration of 2% for multi-depth hydration. This system is supported with the addition of Vitamin B5 which also enhances surface hydration. A more advanced HA formulation with 15 forms of HA, including precursors of HA, is offered by our brand NIOD in Multi-Molecular Hyaluronic Complex.

* Massage a few drops thoroughly into a clean, dry scalp once daily, ideally at bedtime.

attributes.name: Cream Lip Stain
attributes.heading: 5ml
attributes.how-to-text:
For best results, it is advisable to prepare the lips in advance. Your ideal go-to product is the SEPHORA COLLECTION Lip Scrub, to smooth and soften the skin before applying color.
For an even more flawless finish, wear your beloved SEPHORA COLLECTION Cream Lip Stain liquid lipstick with the Lip Stain Liner, a retractable lip pencil that provides precise definition, lasting hold, doesn’t transfer, and helps prolong the life of your lipstick. Choose one of the 20 shades that directly matches your SEPHORA COLLECTION Cream Lip Stain liquid lipstick, or play with contrasts to create an immediate volumizing effect.

1. Starting at the Cupid’s bow, give your mouth a defined silhouette by sliding the liner over the outer contour of the lip, across one side, then the other, then finally along the contour of the bottom lip.
2. For an even greater impression of plumpness, use your Lip Stain Liner to contour the lips – creating shadow areas and accentuating bright zones. Starting from the corners, thicken the lip liner along the lower lip, continuing upwards and across the upper lip. Don’t forget to accentuate the dip of your Cupid’s bow.
3. Lastly, apply a Sephora Collection Cream Lip Stain liquid lipstick in a slightly lighter shade to your lip liner over your lips.
attributes.description: A non-drying lipstick with a comfortable and velvety texture that provides full coverage and high-payoff color. Thanks to its formula enriched with avocado oil, this matte liquid lipstick feels creamy and provides comfort upon application before melting into a light velvety veil of long-lasting lip color.
attributes.benefits: It provides a long-lasting, no-transfer and maskproof makeup result without leaving a trace. It also comes with a precise applicator that allows you to apply exactly the right amount of product.

seo.meta-description: Buy Cream Lip Stain from Sephora Collection here. Meet the silky, long-lasting lip stain that keeps lips covered with bold colour, morning and night.

attributes.how-to:
For best results, it is advisable to prepare the lips in advance. Your ideal go-to product is the SEPHORA COLLECTION Lip Scrub, to smooth and soften the skin before applying color.
For an even more flawless finish, wear your beloved SEPHORA COLLECTION Cream Lip Stain liquid lipstick with the Lip Stain Liner, a retractable lip pencil that provides precise definition, lasting hold, doesn’t transfer, and helps prolong the life of your lipstick. Choose one of the 20 shades that directly matches your SEPHORA COLLECTION Cream Lip Stain liquid lipstick, or play with contrasts to create an immediate volumizing effect.

1. Starting at the Cupid’s bow, give your mouth a defined silhouette by sliding the liner over the outer contour of the lip, across one side, then the other, then finally along the contour of the bottom lip.
2. For an even greater impression of plumpness, use your Lip Stain Liner to contour the lips – creating shadow areas and accentuating bright zones. Starting from the corners, thicken the lip liner along the lower lip, continuing upwards and across the upper lip. Don’t forget to accentuate the dip of your Cupid’s bow.
3. Lastly, apply a Sephora Collection Cream Lip Stain liquid lipstick in a slightly lighter shade to your lip liner over your lips.
